title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 380-9.1 - Eligibility for arbitration
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 380-9.1 - Eligibility for arbitration

State Regulations

Any claim-related dispute, including eligibility, benefit rate, and duration of paid family leave, arising under the PFL is
subject to arbitration as set forth in section
221
of the Workers' Compensation Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
380-9.1

Adopted

New

York State Register July 19, 2017/Volume XXXIX, Issue 29, eff. 7/19/2017

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
